programme.title: College Football Playoff First Round
programme.desc: Indiana (11-1) at Notre Dame (11-1) in a College Football Playoff first-round game. From Notre Dame Stadium. A Hoosier State showdown kicks off the first-ever 12-team CFP format, with first-year coach Curt Cignetti leading IU into South Bend for the first time since 1991, a season that ended with the Hoosiers most recent bowl win. QB Riley Leonard and RB Jeremiyah Love spearhead the Irish against a defense led by all-Big Ten lineman Mikail Kamara, LB Aiden Fisher and DB DAngelo Ponds.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPNs flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, Top Ten Plays, Web polls and trivia.

programme.title: Gasparilla Bowl
programme.desc: Tulane (9-4) vs. Florida (7-5) in the 16th Gasparilla Bowl. From Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Fla. Freshman QB DJ Lagway and the Gators look to cap an uplifting finish to their season after taking down LSU, Ole Miss and FSU in November. Coach Jon Sumralls Tulane squad fell to Army in the AAC title game and lost freshman QB Darian Mensah in a transfer to Duke. The teams last met in 1984.

programme.title: College Football Playoff First Round
programme.desc: Tennessee (10-2) at Ohio State (10-2) in a College Football Playoff first-round game. From Ohio Stadium. Ryan Days Buckeyes look to shake off their stunning loss to Michigan here three weeks ago, with All-Big Ten LB Cody Simon leading the nations top-ranked defense (10.9 ppg) against SEC rushing leader Dylan Sampson and the Vols in their CFP debut. The winner faces No. 1 Oregon in the Rose Bowl quarterfinal. Tennessee won the only previous meeting, 20-14 in the Citrus Bowl 29 years ago.

programme.title: Cure Bowl
programme.desc: Ohio (10-3) vs. Jacksonville State (9-4) in the 10th Cure Bowl. From Camping World Stadium in Orlando, Fla. Champions of the Mid-American Conference and Conference USA collide with interim coaches (OCs Rod Smith and Brian Smith) in charge after Tim Albin (to Charlotte) and Rich Rodriguez (to West Virginia) departed. Ohio is bidding for its sixth straight bowl victory, while the Gamecocks of "Jax State" are going for their second bowl win in just two years of FBS football.

programme.desc: Family vengeance factors into a rape case in which both the cops and the suspect seek outside help: Assistant District Attorney Casey Novak returns to help police, while the accused man recruits his cousin, Los Angeles Deputy District Attorney Jonah Dekker, to defend him.

The holidays are naughty and nice for the first responders, who must deal with a stampede at a toy store, a mistletoe stunt gone awry and neighbors competing in a Christmas-light showdown. Meanwhile, Bobby contemplates his future with Athena, Chimney and Buck attempt to lift Maddies spirits and Eddie must decide if he wants to give his son what he really wants for Christmas?a visit with his mom.

Bobby meets Athenas parents for the first time and Maddie attempts to end her marriage for good, causing Doug to insinuate himself even deeper into Chimneys life. Meanwhile, a tanker carrying a tiger shark crashes on the freeway and a gas leak in a plastic surgeons office happens mid-surgery.
A look back at how Chimney joined Station 118 and became the firefighter and paramedic he is today.
The First Responders rally together to search for a missing Maddie.

The 118 responds to holiday-themed incidents, including a shopper pushed over the edge, a woman who is literally having a "Blue Christmas" and a luggage handler accident on a tarmac. Meanwhile, Maddie revisits her past to embrace her future and Bobby receives shocking news.

In the aftermath of the dam break, massive mudslides wreak havoc throughout Los Angeles. As Athena fights to save herself and an agoraphobic woman after her house collapses, Bobby, Hen and Eddie rush to save hikers endangered by the falling of the Hollywood sign. Meanwhile, Buck and Chimney must rescue a group of pregnant women trapped in a submerged house.

Athena and the 118 race to save lives after a drunk driver causes a deadly pile-up on the freeway. Meanwhile, Maddie goes into labor and Hen and Karen are devastated as they prepare their foster daughter, Nia, to be reunited with her birth mother.

The 118 responds to a series of calls dealing with parents and their children, including a disastrous birthday party thrown by a mommy blogger. Meanwhile, Athena and Michael talk to May about her past suicide attempt, Chimney and Maddie adjust to life with their newborn, and Hen and Karen are emotionally shattered as their foster daughter, Nia, is reunited with her birth mother.
Chimney is determined to find a missing Maddie amongst the chaos of St. Patricks Day.

After a mysterious death, Hen and Chimney put their lives in danger when they suspect that someone is playing God to make themselves look like a hero. Meanwhile, Eddie visits Texas, where he attempts to reconcile with his father.
The members of the 118 race to rescue a cliffside wellness retreat guru after his followers turn on him.

The 118 race to the rescue when a fire breaks out in an accountants office and a car crashes into a "living funeral." Meanwhile, Athena is shocked when a suspect dies in her custody minutes after she arrests him, Buck is attracted to a death doula, and Maddie and Chimney panic when they are audited by the IRS.

The 118 race to rescue two roommates desperately trying to find a needle in a haystack at a landfill, and help a woman whose nightmare dream suddenly becomes a painful reality. Athena and Maddie team-up to find a missing boy in a crowded mall; Chimney debates if the time is right to propose to Maddie.

Athena and the 118 race to rescue when a wedding proposal tragically intersects with a bank robbery, and then when a princess bride is literally stuck on her way to the altar. Athena talks a victim thru her grief; Maddie takes matters into her own hands as Buck finds a surprise visitor on his doorstep.

programme.desc: An Australian farmer (James Cromwell) adopts a piglet that becomes a champion sheepherder. Live action/animatronics.

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) is on the trail of his ex-boss (Herbert Lom), who is out to destroy the world.

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A domesticated macaw (Jesse Eisenberg) and his human friend (Leslie Mann) travel to Rio de Janeiro to meet the last surviving female (Anne Hathaway) of his kind.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: While a man (Jack Black) is on assignment in the Bermuda Triangle, a vortex transports him to Lilliput, a magic land of little people.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: SpongeBob (Tom Kenny) and Patrick (Bill Fagerbakke) head for Shell City to retrieve King Neptune's stolen crown and save the life of Mr. Krabs (Clancy Brown).

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-film star (Gene Kelly) loves a chorus girl (Debbie Reynolds) who dubs his squeaky-voiced co-star in a 1927 Hollywood talkie.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: Mr. Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: A stern businessman's (Jim Carrey) chilly relationship with his ex-wife (Carla Gugino) and children warms up after he inherits six mischievous penguins.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home.

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Manny (Ray Romano), Sid (John Leguizamo), Diego (Denis Leary) and the rest of the herd must leave home after Scrat's (Chris Wedge) adventure in outer space sends an asteroid hurtling toward Earth.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: After a tornado whisks Kansas farm girl Dorothy (Judy Garland) to a magic land, she must travel to the Emerald City for help in getting back home.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Armed with nothing but a hatful of dreams, young chocolatier Willy Wonka manages to change the world, one delectable bite at a time.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A misfit Viking teenager sees a chance to change the course of his clan's future when he befriends an injured dragon.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
programme.desc: Felines and canines form an unprecedented alliance to protect themselves and their humans from a rogue cat who wants to turn the world into her personal scratching post.

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.sub-title: Juntos Otra Vez, Together Again: Vacation
programme.desc: An energetic dog and a mellow cat teach vocabulary in English and Spanish.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.sub-title: An American Girl in Paris (Part Deux)
programme.desc: Carrie meets Aleksandr's ex-wife; Samantha's chemotherapy leaves her with no libido; Charlotte and Harry try to adopt a baby; Steve's mother has a small stroke.

programme.title: The Normal Heart
programme.desc: In 1980s New York, a writer (Mark Ruffalo) and his friends join forces to expose the truth about the emerging AIDs crisis to both the government and the gay community.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Traffik
programme.desc: A couple and their two friends embark on a weekend getaway to an isolated estate in the mountains. They soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when members of a violent biker gang show up to protect their secrets from the outside world.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a rapidly evolving form of dementia, a contract killer gets the chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: A steelworker (Christian Bale) takes matters into his own hands when his brother (Casey Affleck) joins one of the Northeast's most-ruthless crime syndicates, then disappears.

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: A man (Keegan-Michael Key) and his cousin (Jordan Peele) pose as ruthless gangsters to recover a stolen kitten.

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird.

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: When members of a dance troupe are lured to an empty school, drug-laced sangria causes their jubilant rehearsal to descend into a dark and explosive nightmare as they try to survive the night -- and find out who's responsible -- before it's too late.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1
programme.desc: In 1859 families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1
programme.desc: In 1859 families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: An FBI agent finds herself choosing sides between two factions of a criminal gang while trying to keep her hijacked plane from going down.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The muscular hero forms Ursa Major and fights space robots to save a princess who has been kidnapped.

programme.title: The Kill Team

programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his team face an underworld prince who plans to awaken a lethal army and use it to reclaim Earth for his magical kindred.

programme.title: Shazam!

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: Criminals and some crooked cops hatch a devious scheme to use an honest lawman as a pawn for a heist.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown

programme.title: The Watchers

programme.title: The Strangers: Prey at Night

programme.title: AKA Mr. Chow

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: Batgirl joins the caped crusaders (George Clooney, Chris O'Donnell) to stop Mr. Freeze (Arnold Schwarzenegger) and Poison Ivy from wreaking revenge upon the world.

programme.title: Woodshock
programme.desc: A haunted young woman spirals into confusion and chaos after she falls under the spell of a potent, reality-altering drug.

programme.title: Woodshock
programme.desc: A haunted young woman spirals into confusion and chaos after she falls under the spell of a potent, reality-altering drug.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) grows suspicious of her controlling husband (Joseph Fiennes) after she discovers secrets about the women in his past.

programme.title: Invictus

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence

programme.desc: Detective Jack Radcliff gets a shocking phone call from his recently murdered niece Ashley. Working together across time, they race to solve the crime before it can happen.

programme.desc: The Caped Crusader (Val Kilmer) woos a criminal psychologist, takes on a sidekick and battles Two-Face (Tommy Lee Jones) and the Riddler (Jim Carrey).
